"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e274ee6368725547bb0200#post_54e274ee6368725547bb0200
Tony Stark is like a better developed version of Bruce Wayne. He loves his friends but some of those fuckers are tough to beat. So he makes specific armor for dealing with them. Unfortunately the Thorbuster armor got destroyed after a political snafu with Latveria and Asgard.
